alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:29AM CDT until June 24 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Nance County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Northern Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 428 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Silver Creek, or 18 miles west of Columbus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Nance, northeastern Merrick and northern Polk Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
